name: Rules! (itch)
description:
A simple endless survival game... or is it so simple?  Your task is to collect as many points as possible and avoid  getting caught by the computer's AI. All the while , the  computer may start trying to cheat.  Try to survive, and collect points as the rules of the game may be changed in front of your own eyes!

Play by the Rules and see if you are up to the challenge!

Theme: Mischief

Made in three days
